testcase.classname: User should login the Adactin Application
testcase.name: To check whether “search order id ”query is working and displaying the relevant details. - 117
testcase.system-out: Given User should launch the adactin application............................passed Then User should Validate the login page....................................passed Then User enter the username "<username>" and password "<password>".........passed Then User enter the login button............................................passed Then User verify that correct username is displayed on the login page.......passed Then User should location as in test data "Sydney"..........................passed And User should hotel as in test data "Hotel Creek".........................passed And User should room type as in test data "Standard"........................passed And User should no-of-rooms as in test data "2".............................passed And User should enter the today date "01/06/2019"...........................passed And User should enter the tomorrow date "02/06/2019"........................passed Then User should enter the no of Adults "1" and number of childrens "1".....passed Then User click the search button...........................................passed And User should click the radiobuttoin......................................passed Then User should click the continue button..................................passed Then User should enter the "thenu"and"babu"and"kh road"and "1234567891234567".passed Then User should enter the card type "VISA" & "August" & "2014" & "1234"....passed Then User should click the booknow button...................................passed Then User should generate the order number..................................passed When User should click the Booked Itinerary button..........................passed Then User should enter the order id and click the go button.................passed
